rainbowReef

Class Katch

  • java.lang.Object
    • game2D.objects.GameObject
      • game2D.objects.MoveableObject
        • game2D.objects.PlayerShip
          • rainbowReef.Katch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Katch
extends PlayerShip
    Katch is the moving sea snail to catch pop. Katch moves only left or right. Pop bounces off katch in directions that depend on the point of impact
    Author:
    Fudou
